Independent
Independent
Você foi punido por matar a equipe duas vezes durante esta sessão do servidor. Seu inventário foi limpo e agora você está bloqueado para o lado Independente.
You are restricted to the Independent side, due to having 2+ teamkills during this server session AND/OR more than 10 Teamkills.
You have played as %1 for too long and cannot switch to the other team. You can still play as Independent. (ADMIN WILL NOT MOVE YOU)
You have been kicked too many times for using voice. You can join another server or wait until server restart.
<t color='#FF8000' size='2.5' >Servidor Anônimos </t>

* Você está no time %3 < /t >< /t > team.
* ATTACKING or STEALING from other %4 < /t > players is BANNABLE
* Punish Teamkillers to move to Indie. 10+ Teamkills = Permanently Indie (Automated)

* Você está no %3 team.
* Você é Livre para matar qualquer um

Conquest: Capture e mantenha as bandeiras para ganhar dinheiro.
Precione a tecla windows para ver o nome dos jogadores
Precione END para colocar os tampões de ouvido

Team killing is frowned upon!
If this was a mistake then you must explain yourself and say sorry, otherwise they will mark you as teamkiller and you will get kicked.

1. Keep bad language to a minimum. If you have a problem with another player, take it to direct.
2. NO VOIP IN GLOBAL. Use the channels or Discord!.
3. Do not exploit R3F or any other add-ons or you will be banned.
4. Using or spamming with loud\long custom sound commands will cause punishment up to permanent ban

Key.English: Greece is a hot place! Drink plenty!
An improvised roof, 4 sticks and a blanket!
The Greek wastelands may get you hungry!
With this kit, you won't need an engineer!
With this kit, you won't need a medic!
25 litres of pure unleaded fuel!
Empty fuel can. You can refill it!
Choose your spawn location. Disclaimer: This product does not guarantee safe delivery of goods.
Go forth and steal fuel from vehicles!
Allows you to sprint continuously for 5 minutes.
A safe to store your team's money.

Package.Key: + This programming tool is a once use only and non removable device to add a pincode to an owned vehicle. By using this your friends can also lock and unlock your vehicle! +

Você foi morto pelo %2 jogador %1

If this was an accident, forgive him, otherwise they should explain their actions.

If the player does not apologize, punish him.
